testsuite.name: End to End E-commerce API validation

testcase.name: 1 Verify the login API, whether able to login
2 Verify the Product API, whether able to create a new product
3 Verify the Order API, whether able to create a new order
4 Verify the Order Detail API, whether able to fetch order details
5 Verify the Order Delete API, whether able to delete order
6 Verify the Product Delete API, whether able to delete product
